description: Implemented CV models (Haar Cascade, YOLO v5/v7) for real-time surveillance.
Completed text detection projects using hybrid SVM + HMM; improved accuracy by 20%.
Designed deep learning models for emotional understanding in robots.
Used PyTorch and Keras; scaled models from 200k parameters based on needs.
Simulated 3D models of cube-sat; programmed propulsion system in C++.
Developed analytical systems in Julia; created simulation graphs with Python.
Utilized PyTorch, Keras, and ReACT-generated dataset (70k samples, 600k parameters).
